attributes.action: create more family friendly hours in the work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the Prime Minister to create more family friendly hours in the work place. me and my partner both work nights and have just had a child, we have been struggling to change our hours because the family friendly hours are all used up! this is unacceptable. there are people who are on family friendly hours who dont need them as much as others.
